channel.title: Bible on Flanagan's Findings
channel.description: Recent content in Bible on Flanagan's Findings

item.title: More About Chris
item.description: A Disciple of ישוע/Jesus A blessed husband of an amazing wife and father of two musically talented young adults A Bible student and teacher with a passion for Israel and seeking the historical context An advancing Hebrew learner A strategic thinker with an eye for analytics and detail In my 30-year healthcare career my mission was simple (and this applies to all of life): Glofiry God in all I do Always remember the patient comes first Remove hurdles for my subordinates and customers Make my boss look good I’m glad you’re here!
